price: 24. (Y Al-lah dirá a los ángeles:) “Arrojen al Infierno a todo obstinado que negaba la verdad,
arabic: أَلۡقِيَا فِي جَهَنَّمَ كُلَّ كَفَّارٍ عَنِيدٖ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: alqiyā fī jahannama kulla kaffārin ʿanīdin
